Title: Run evaluations in Experiments
introduction: You can now run LLM evals in Experiments. Import the defined evaluators and then choose the evaluator you want to run for each cell.

New.description: Track prompt changes for each version, similar to GitHub.
View detailed metrics for each run in every cell.
Log variables in prompts when executing them on the platform.

Improved.description: Improved the setup process for webhooks.
Clear all evaluation results with a single click.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where the Dashboard summary values were incorrect.
Fixed a bug where images couldn't render correctly.
Fixed a bug where JSON mode didn't work in the side panel.
Fixed a bug where the ideal output was missing when duplicating a row.
